text: Fun family feel at this children’s rugby club.  Great modern facilities and even has an area with fans for parents and supporters to watch the players train and play. Despite being in the north of Singapore, it’s pretty easily accessible and only 15-20 minutes drive from Bukit Timah.

Have really loved the 8 years with Centaurs. The ethos of playing fair and supporting your mates is one that really serves my children, and the wonderful volunteers + team give a strong sense of family.  The competitions and club testimonials helped with the direct school admissions process.
Rugby journey started here - Great place to play, and friendly atmosphere - friends for life to be made as it is a fantastic community
Great club! Awesome place for boys and girls to learn rugby and touch ! Best facilities in SG
Amazing club and incredible people! Culture is second to none and everyone is welcome.
